snippet.title: Fillit promotion video
snippet.description:
Filit is a frantic 1 to 4 player casual action game based and inspired by the nostalgic Xonix and Volfied adding a unique mechanics and new gameplay. 

Grab your areas while avoiding your enemies and bad bosses. 

Single player

Over 45 single player levels
Classic game mode in stunning HD
Fight 30 unique bosses
Play together

Play together and win over 20 levels 
Local Co-Op for two players
Solve challenging situations and overcome boss levels
Play against friends (Coming soon...)

Up to 4 players 
Try to beat your friends 
6 different arenas 
Use your special powers and abilities

Discord: https://discord.gg/MB2PAqB6Ts
Itch: https://11sheep.itch.io/fillit
